title: Trying to delete a ›is-followed-by-event‹ relationship with invalid RACING EVENT ID
gherkin:
Given there exists a "RACING EVENT" "GP Monaco"
And "RACING EVENT" "DTM Norisring" does NOT exist
When the user deletes the "is followed by event" relationship between "GP Monaco" and "DTM Norisring"
Then the request should be rejected with status code 404
